Reviewing Properties

The properties displayed vary according to the type of object you select:

  • For projects and project databases, you can view or change the configuration file, archive location, and workspace settings.
  • For Version Manager folders, you can view the number of files included and change the workspace settings.
  • For versioned files, you can view archive information and change the description or workspace settings. You can also display version labels, promotion groups, and branches associated with a revision.
  • For revisions, version labels, and promotion groups, you can view revision information and change the revision description. You can also display version labels, promotion groups, and branches.

To review properties:

  1. Select the project database or project in the Project pane, versioned file in the Versioned File or Detail pane, or revision in the Detail pane.

  2. Select File | Properties.
